titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Budd Jones, Indictment
CWG0899

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1863-1867

body.p:
(Copy of Indictment.)
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against
Budd Jones
The Grand Jury of Russell County impanneled charged and sworn in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Ky accuse Budd Jones of the crime of murder

Committed as follows, viz the said Willson Budd Jones did on the 10th day of February 1863 in the County of Russell aforesaid unlawfully, willfully, wickedly, feloniously and with Malice aforethought Kill and Murder one Lewis Higgenbotton with a pistol loaded with a Leaden Ball
Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Ky

M H Ousley
Atty for the Comwlth

A copy attest
A. P. Simpson C R C C

Commonwealth
vs } Indictment Murder
Budd Jones
a True Bill
Green B Selby
Foreman
Filed Nov 5th 1863
Attest George Bryan
clerk
